dbi.sqlite.SqliteResult

class SqliteResult: dbi.BaseResult.BaseResult;
Manage the results of a sqlite result set. This class implements all of the current DBD Result interface. The interface is not described here again, instead please view Result directly.

See Also:
Result

this(sqlite3_stmt * stmt);
